name: The Court Buddy Company, Inc.
description: Operator of a legal marketplace intended to assist consumers in connecting with local independent attorneys. The company's platform matches attorneys who provide a-la-carte legal services at fixed rates with clients, enabling users to get access to an attorney when needed.
one_liner: Operator of a legal marketplace intended to assist consumers in connecting with local independent attorneys. The company's platform matches attorneys who provide a-la-carte legal services at fixed rates with clients, enabling users to get access to an attorney when needed.
